title: Origins
content:
uring Character Creation where players can step into the shoes of these pre-made characters and start their adventure. Origin Characters for Baldur's Gate 3 are equipped with stats, unique personal backstories, exclusive quests, motivations, and distinct interactions with the world. This is an advantage to better understand the lore and background for each of the available Origin Characters.
